prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Piano, Drums, Organ, Brass, Guitar, but without Synth Pad.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Bass, Piano, Drums, Organ, Brass, and Guitar, but no Synth Pad.

Style 2:

Style 3:
This song is made up of Bass, Piano, Drums, Organ, Brass, and Guitar, excluding Synth Pad.
